microcopy.hed_template: After Sandy Hook we said never again. And then we let {number} mass shootings happen.

stops.text: In December 2012, a gunman walked into Sandy Hook Elementary School in Newtown, Connecticut, and killed 20 children, six adults, and himself.
By December 2, 2015, the day a gunman killed 14 and wounded 24 others in San Bernadino California, there had been TBD more mass shootings

google_docs_text.data:
﻿This is a doc for shootings tracker update project. Ignore everything highlighted in green. They are housekeeping markers for the code.


Don’t worry about the GVA ids or exact death and injury tolls.


hed: After Sandy Hook we said never again. And then we let TK mass shootings happen.


[Incidents]


GVAid: 1
Text: In December 2012, a gunman walked into Sandy Hook Elementary School in Newtown, Connecticut, and killed 20 children, six adults, and himself.


GVAid: 456893
Text: By December 2, 2015, when two shooters killed TK and wounded TK others in San Bernardino, California, there had been TK more mass shootings.


GVAid:
Text: Seven months later, on June 12, 2016, a gunman killed TK people and wounded TK others at a nightclub in Orlando, Florida.


It was the deadliest mass shooting in modern U.S. history…
:end


GVAid:
Text: …until October 1, 2017 when a gunman opened fire at a music festival on the Las Vegas strip leaving TK people dead and TK injured.


GVAid:
Text: One month later, a gunman opened fire at a Sunday church service in Sutherland Springs, Texas, killing TK and wounding at least TK.


GVAid:
Text: Then, on February 14, 2018, a gunman opened fire at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School in Parkland, Florida, killing TK and wounding at least TK.


Graphic: Zoom out to the full map?
Text: In total, there have been at least TK mass shootings since the Sandy Hook shooting, with at least TK killed and TK wounded.


Graphic: Maybe highlight all states with mass shootings?
Text: The map shows that almost no state is safe from mass gun violence, even as crime and murder rates have generally declined in the past couple of decades.


Graphic: Some sort of chart? Maybe this one: https://cdn.vox-cdn.com/thumbor/VCSDpKu-KPwUPb2r5F6i9j8NwUA=/0x0:3840x2794/920x0/filters:focal(0x0:3840x2794):format(webp)/cdn.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/10328765/GUN_SCATTERPLOT_2x.png 
Text: America is a big outlier when it comes to gun deaths — in large part because it has so many guns, making it easy to carry out an act of violence. Studies have linked stricter gun laws to fewer gun deaths. But the US has the weakest gun laws in the developed world.


Graphic: Some sort of chart?[a][b][c]
Text: As shocking as mass shootings are, they are responsible for only a small portion of all gun deaths. In 2016, mass shooting deaths represented less than 2 percent of all gun deaths in the US — 456 of nearly 39,000 overall gun deaths. More than 14,000 of the gun deaths that year were homicides. Almost 23,000, the great majority, were suicides.


Methodology paragraph at the end: Mass shooting data comes from the Gun Violence Archive, which defines mass shootings as events in which four or more people, excluding the shooter, were shot but not necessarily killed at the same general time and location. GVA’s definition differs from other definitions of mass shootings, which may require that four or more people are killed or exclude certain shootings, such as gang-related and domestic events.
[a]dot graphics?
[b]I like this!!
[c]Maybe it could highlight different sections of the dot graphic as it goes from all deaths to mass shootings to homicides to suicides.

GVAid:

Text: Seven months later, on June 12, 2016, a gunman killed TK people and wounded TK others at a nightclub in Orlando, Florida.

It was the deadliest mass shooting in modern U.S. history…

:end

GVAid:

Text: …until October 1, 2017 when a gunman opened fire at a music festival on the Las Vegas strip leaving TK people dead and TK injured.

GVAid:

Text: One month later, a gunman opened fire at a Sunday church service in Sutherland Springs, Texas, killing TK and wounding at least TK.

GVAid:

Text: Then, on February 14, 2018, a gunman opened fire at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School in Parkland, Florida, killing TK and wounding at least TK.

Graphic: Zoom out to the full map?

Text: In total, there have been at least TK mass shootings since the Sandy Hook shooting, with at least TK killed and TK wounded.

GVA’s definition differs from other definitions of mass shootings, which may require that four or more people are killed or exclude certain shootings, such as gang-related and domestic events.
